Used Items: NS 1234567890, Calibration date: 10/01/2022, Fluke Model 31-B, Code: C10.1.2.3.4

Test_Cases.name:
Purpose of the Test CASE: 
To verify the normal operation of Doors from Cabin.
(Central Opening & Auto Closing)
Test_Cases.description:
Purpose of the Test CASE: 
To verify the normal operation of Doors from Cabin.
(Central Opening & Auto Closing)

test_actions.text:
In Non-Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Side selection (Left or Right).
Nothing happens. Virtual pushbutton on HMI is non-operative.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Left Side selection
Left side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Central Opening.

All Doors on Left side of the active cab will Open:
C1 (Left): Doors - 11, 12, 13 and 14
C2 (Left): Doors - 1, 2, 3 and 4
Wait for CLOSE_DELAY_TIME
All Doors will be closed automatically but stay released.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again.
Doors release is lost.
Doors release is lost.
Doors release is lost.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Right Side selection
Right side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Central Opening.

All Doors on Right side of the active cab will Open:
C1 (Right): Doors - 1, 2, 3 and 4
C2 (Right): Doors - 11, 12, 13 and 14
Wait for CLOSE_DELAY_TIME
All Doors will be closed automatically but stay released.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again.
Doors release is lost.
Doors release is lost.
Doors release is lost.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Left Side selection.
Left side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Right Side selection.
Nothing happens. Side selection will remain same and only one side selected at any moment.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Left Side selection again.
Side selection lost. Left side indication on HMI turns grey.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Right Side selection.
Right side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Left Side selection.
Nothing happens. Side selection will remain same and only one side selected at any moment.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Right Side selection.
Side selection lost. Right side indication on HMI turns grey.

In Both C1 & C2 Car:
- Simulate vehicle running condition by removing the Cables from Relay terminal 18K01: 2(+)

In Both C1 & C2 Car:
- Simulate vehicle running condition by removing the Cables from Relay terminal 18K01: 2(+)

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Right Side selection.
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Door is not released.

In Both C1 & C2 Car:
- Re-connect back the Cables into the Relay terminal 18K01: 2(+)

In Both C1 & C2 Car:
- Re-connect back the Cables into the Relay terminal 18K01: 2(+)

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Door is released (Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE).

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again.
Door Release is cancelled.
Door Release is cancelled.
Door Release is cancelled.

Test_Cases.name:
Purpose of the Test CASE: 
To verify the normal operation of Doors from Cabin.
(Central Opening & Forced Closing)
Test_Cases.description:
Purpose of the Test CASE: 
To verify the normal operation of Doors from Cabin.
(Central Opening & Forced Closing)

test_actions.text:
In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Left Side selection
Left side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Central Opening.

All Doors on Left side of the active cab will Open:
C1 (Left): Doors - 11, 12, 13 and 14
C2 (Left): Doors - 1, 2, 3 and 4

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again before CLOSE_DELAY_TIME
All Doors closed and Door release is cancelled.
All Doors closed and Door release is cancelled.
All Doors closed and Door release is cancelled.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Right Side selection
Right side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Central Opening.

All Doors on Right side of the active cab will Open:
C1 (Right): Doors - 1, 2, 3 and 4
C2 (Right): Doors - 11, 12, 13 and 14

In Active CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again before CLOSE_DELAY_TIME
All Doors closed and Door release is cancelled.
All Doors closed and Door release is cancelled.
All Doors closed and Door release is cancelled.

Test_Cases.name:
Purpose of the Test CASE: 
To check Door Opening via Door pushbutton after doors have been released - Command from C1 Car
Test_Cases.description:
Purpose of the Test CASE: 
To check Door Opening via Door pushbutton after doors have been released - Command from C1 Car

test_actions.text:
In C1 CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Left Side selection.
Left side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In C1 CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Left Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.
Left Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In any Door on Right Side (Door-1, 2, 3, 4):
- Press Door pushbutton (inside or outside)
Nothing happens. Door will not open.

In any Door on Left Side (Door-14, 13, 12, 11):
- Press Door pushbutton (inside or outside)
Local Door will open. All other Doors stay closed.
Wait for CLOSE_DELAY_TIME
Opened Door will close automatically.
Opened Door will close automatically.

In C1 CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again.
Door release is cancelled and "All Door Close" Green indicator will appear on HMI.

In C1 CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Right Side selection.
Right side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In C1 CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Right Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.
Right Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In any Door on Left Side (Door-14, 13, 12, 11):
- Press Door pushbutton (inside or outside)
Nothing happens. Door will not open.

In any Door on Right Side (Door-1, 2, 3, 4):
- Press Door pushbutton (inside or outside)
Local Door will open. All other Doors stay closed.
Wait for CLOSE_DELAY_TIME
Opened Door will close automatically.
Opened Door will close automatically.

In C1 CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again.
Door release is cancelled and "All Door Close" Green indicator will appear on HMI.

In any Door on Right Side (Door-11, 12, 13, 14):
- Press Door pushbutton (inside or outside)
Local Door will open. All other Doors stay closed.
Wait for CLOSE_DELAY_TIME
Opened Door will close automatically.

In C2 CABIN:

In Car:

In Car:

In Car:

Test_Cases.name:
Purpose of the Test CASE
To Check the Outside & Inside Crew Switch Operation - C1 Car
Test_Cases.description:
Purpose of the Test CASE
To Check the Outside & Inside Crew Switch Operation - C1 Car
initial_conditions: - There is no Active Cab in Train.

test_actions.text:
Outside C1 CABIN:
- Move the Outside Crew Switch 50S10 to "Open" position.
Door-14 will Open. All other doors stay closed

Outside C1 CABIN:
- Move the Outside Crew Switch 50S10 to "Close" position.
Door-14 will close automatically 20 seconds later.

Outside C1 CABIN:
- Move the Crew Switch 50S10 to "Open" position again
Door-14 will Open. All other doors stay closed.
Go inside C1 CABIN and Wait for 5 mins.
Door-14 will close automatically.

In C1 CABIN:
- Move the Inside Crew Switch 50S11 to "Open" position.
Door-14 will Open. All other doors stay closed
Come Out of Train and Wait for 5 mins.
Door-14 will close automatically.

Test_Cases.name:
Purpose of the Test CASE
To Check the Outside & Inside Crew Switch Operation - C2 Car
Test_Cases.description:
Purpose of the Test CASE
To Check the Outside & Inside Crew Switch Operation - C2 Car
initial_conditions: - There is no Active Cab in Train.

test_actions.text:
Outside C2 CABIN:
- Move the Outside Crew Switch 50S10 to "Open" position.
Door-4 will Open. All other doors stay closed

Outside C2 CABIN:
- Move the Outside Crew Switch 50S10 to "Close" position.
Door-4 will close automatically 20 seconds later.

Outside C2 CABIN:
- Move the Crew Switch 50S10 to "Open" position again
Door-4 will Open. All other doors stay closed.
Go inside C2 CABIN and Wait for 5 mins.
Door-4 will close automatically.

In C2 CABIN:
- Move the Inside Crew Switch 50S11 to "Open" position.
Door-4 will Open. All other doors stay closed
Come Out of Train and Wait for 5 mins.
Door-4 will close automatically.

Test_Cases.description:

test_actions.text:
In CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.

All Doors will close 
("All Door Close" Green indicator will appear on HMI)

All Doors will close 
("All Door Close" Green indicator will appear on HMI)

All Doors will close 
("All Door Close" Green indicator will appear on HMI)

In Passenger Area:
- Open DOOR-1 by using door emergency release switch.
"All Door Close" Green indicator will disappear on HMI.
"All Door Close" Green indicator will disappear on HMI.
"All Door Close" Green indicator will disappear on HMI.

In CABIN:
- Operate the Door Loop Bypass Switch 54S01.
Check the switch is sealed
"All Door Close" Green indicator on HMI will glow continuously.
"All Door Close" Green indicator on HMI will glow continuously.
"All Door Close" Green indicator on HMI will glow continuously.

In Passenger Area:
- Manually close the DOOR-1 by resetting the door emergency release switch.
Nothing happens

In CABIN:
- Reset the Door Loop Bypass Switch 54S01.
Alarm Reset and "All Door Close" Green indicator will appear on HMI.

"All Door Close" Green indicator will disappear on HMI.

Test_Cases.name:
Purpose of the Test CASE:
1. First command from cabin
2. Open from the Stop Request PB
Verify the functionality of Stop Request through Handrail pushbuttons from Group-1.
Test has to be repeated from cabin C1 and cabin C2
Test_Cases.description:
Purpose of the Test CASE:
1. First command from cabin
2. Open from the Stop Request PB
Verify the functionality of Stop Request through Handrail pushbuttons from Group-1.
Test has to be repeated from cabin C1 and cabin C2

test_actions.text:
In CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Side selection (Left or Right).
Selected side indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release.
Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.

In Passenger Area:
- Press any one of the pushbutton from Group-1 Handrail
(91S01, 91S02, 91S03, 91S04, 91S08, 91S09, 91S12)

Door will open based on the selected side:
- C1: Door-1 (Right) or Door-14 (Left)
- C2: Door-11 (Right) or Door-4 (Left)
Wait for CLOSE_DELAY _TIME
Opened Door will close automatically.

In CABIN:
- On HMI, press the virtual pushbutton for Door Release again
All Doors closed and indication will be displayed on HMI.

Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.
Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.
Door Release indication on HMI turns BLUE.
Wait for approx. 1 minute

Opened Door will remain open. Other Doors stay closed.

All Doors closed and indication will be displayed on HMI.
